nor stal check let's find out what it
means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation nostalgic when you
recall your college or school days you
feel very happy as they bring back good
memories from the past and those days no
longer exist nostalgic basically means
to be sentimental and cherish the good
times in the past if you feel nostalgic
you think very affectionately about an
experience you had in the past and wish
but things would remain the same as they
were in the past
it is the good feeling you get when you
remember your past you sit back smile
and think to yourself wow those days
were real fun in other words it is a
longing desire to go back in the past
maybe to a place time in the past or to
a person's company that always made you
happy it could also mean the state of
being homesick or longing for home for
example when you are away from home
you become homesick as you miss your
family you become nostalgic about
returning home
as nostalgic describes the feeling of
being sad or happy at the same time it
is an adjective okay now that you know
what nostalgic means let's take a look
at some example sentences to see how you
can use it in your daily conversation
example 1 when Samantha was at the cafe
with her ex colleagues she felt
nostalgic while speaking about their
happy and fun days at work example 2
Peter felt extremely nostalgic while
listening to old romantic songs it
reminded him of his good old days with
his girlfriend example 3 when David
visited his village after many years he
became nostalgic as he missed his school
days and the simple lifestyle example
for Maria felt nostalgic when she saw
wooden toys handicrafts and colorful
dolls at the exhibition as they were her
favorite possessions in her childhood
days example 5 while the young girls
attempted their first baking and made
cookies it brought them nostalgic
memories of their grandmother's kitchen
example six after reading her son's
email the nostalgic mother wept as she
longed to be with her son who was
studying overseas example 7 at the park
when the old man saw little children on
the tire swing he felt very nostalgic
example 8 while addressing the marketing
staff the manager spoke nostalgic ly
about her first job experience as a
salesgirl example 9 during the concert
the band struck up nostalgic music and
took the audience back in the aura of
1950's example 10 away from the family
Jennifer felt nostalgic while opening
the Christmas gifts sent by her family
